page.title: 13BUSINESSES 1.
page.content: There are now manufacturing industries in this area,but there a number of businesses other than shops,garages, public houses and farms.The main ones being trout fisheries,pig breeding, poultry farming,landscape gardening, nurseries,coal merchants,caravan parks,agricultural merchants and a vetinary surgeon.We visited two of these. {George Rees Ltd - Agricultural {Merchant. } Number of people employed 13 (5 from Caerwys Parish) Grinds and sells animal feeds. Caters for all agricultural needs, fertilizers,seeds,hardware etc. Goods delivered all over Clwyd by outside contractors.
